<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Searing Restoration](/Feats.aspx?ID=3054) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Unstable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=416" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 26</row>

</column>

---

They told you there was no way that explosions could heal people, but they were fools… Fools who didn't understand your brilliance! You create a minor explosion from your innovation, altering the combustion to cauterize wounds using vaporized medicinal herbs. You or a living creature adjacent to you regains 1d10 Hit Points. In addition, the creature you heal can attempt an immediate flat check to recover from a single source of [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), with the DC reduction from appropriate assistance.

 At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, increase the healing by 1d10.

**Special** If your innovation is a [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109), it can take this action rather than you, though because it's not a living creature, it can't use the ability on itself.
name: Searing Restoration
